images.name: 封面图
images.prompt: Docker container technology illustration, blue whale logo concept, modern tech style, containers and microservices visualization, clean minimalist design, professional tech aesthetic, blue and white color scheme, 16:9 aspect ratio

images.name: 基础命令示意图
images.prompt: Docker command line interface visualization, terminal window with docker commands, flat design illustration, technical diagram style, blue and gray colors, simple and clean, 3:2 aspect ratio

images.name: 实战部署流程图
images.prompt: Docker deployment workflow diagram, containers and images flow, step by step process illustration, flat design style, technical drawing, blue and orange accent colors, clean layout, 3:2 aspect ratio

images.name: Docker Compose 架构图
images.prompt: Docker Compose multi-container architecture, services interconnection diagram, database and application containers, flat technical illustration, modern design, blue color scheme, 3:2 aspect ratio

images.name: 最佳实践示意图
images.prompt: Docker best practices visualization, security and optimization concepts, layered architecture diagram, flat design illustration, professional tech style, blue and green colors, 3:2 aspect ratio
